changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "pipeline" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "deleted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "kind" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "status" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "payload" JSONB NULL, "started_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "finished_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "error_message" TEXT NULL, "target_release_id" UUID NULL, "runtime_id" UUID NOT NULL, "requester_account_id" UUID NOT NULL, "previous_pipeline_id" UUID NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("target_release_id") REFERENCES "release" ("id") ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY ("runtime_id") REFERENCES "runtime" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("requester_account_id") REFERENCES "account" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("previous_pipeline_id") REFERENCES "pipeline" ("id") ON DELETE SET NULL ); CREATE INDEX "idx_pipeline_runtime_id" ON "pipeline" ("runtime_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_pipeline_requester_account_id" ON "pipeline" ("requester_account_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_pipeline_previous_pipeline_id" ON "pipeline" ("previous_pipeline_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "previous_pipeline_id" IS NOT NULL; CREATE INDEX "idx_pipeline_target_release_id" ON "pipeline" ("target_release_id") WHERE "deleted_at" IS NULL AND "target_release_id" IS NOT NULL;
